events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Customer support agent Emma has been assigned to assist with the refund process.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money returned within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund process.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
As you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
